plugin_fields.label: Reminder interval value (weekly)
plugin_fields.description: When interval type is set to "daily" or "once", leave this field blank. For "weekly" interval, send in comma separated all lower-case days of the week (e.g wednesday, friday).

plugin_fields.description: When the interval type is set to "daily" or "weekly", leave this field blank. For "once" interval, set or select a date.

options.slate: [{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"High-Risk Hypertension Profile","bold":true}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Date:","bold":true},{"text":" "},{"type":"dynamic-variable","variableId":"yH2jhxCLGg6t","value":"DATE_OF_SUBMISSION","children":[{"text":"{{{dynamic_variable:yH2jhxCLGg6t}}}"}],"status":"VALID"},{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Clinical Findings: ","bold":true}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"BMI: "},{"type":"dynamic-variable","variableId":"lvwGV04JVJpU","value":"BMI","children":[{"text":"{{{dynamic_variable:lvwGV04JVJpU}}}"}],"status":"VALID"},{"text":" "}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"BP History: History of blood pressure reading above 180/120 mmHg in the past 12 months"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"High salt intake reported - often adds salt to food and frequently consumes high-salt processed foods (ICD-10 Code: Z72.4 - Inappropriate diet and eating habits)"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Lifestyle Factors: "},{"type":"dynamic-variable","variableId":"fd1SXW-fnZQX","value":"lifestyle-factors","children":[{"text":"{{{dynamic_variable:fd1SXW-fnZQX}}}"}],"status":"VALID"},{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Recommendations","bold":true},{"text":":"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Immediate consultation with a healthcare provider for a comprehensive evaluation and management plan."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Consideration for lifestyle modification programs and possible pharmacological interventions."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Regular monitoring and follow-up appointments to assess and manage blood pressure and related health parameters."}]}]

plugin_fields.value:
High-Risk Hypertension Profile

Date: {{{dynamic_variable:yH2jhxCLGg6t}}}

Clinical Findings:

BMI: {{{dynamic_variable:lvwGV04JVJpU}}}

BP History: History of blood pressure reading above 180/120 mmHg in the past 12 months

High salt intake reported - often adds salt to food and frequently consumes high-salt processed foods (ICD-10 Code: Z72.4 - Inappropriate diet and eating habits)

Lifestyle Factors: {{{dynamic_variable:fd1SXW-fnZQX}}}

Recommendations:

Immediate consultation with a healthcare provider for a comprehensive evaluation and management plan.

Consideration for lifestyle modification programs and possible pharmacological interventions.

Regular monitoring and follow-up appointments to assess and manage blood pressure and related health parameters.
